name: Shadow's Echo (Alpha 0.1.1)
description:
Welcome to my first game upload! As you can tell, it's in kind of rough shape. This is a visual novel I was working on in RPG Maker MV, and I'm just now getting back to working on it. In this alpha version, you can play through part of Day 1 and get a general idea what the characters and settings are like. Eventually, there will be multiple paths across multiple days, with over ten different endings.

This MAY be ported to another program eventually(Ren'Py, maybe?), as the programming is rather rough and RPG Maker isn't really made for Visual Novels. If I do so, I will re-upload the project as a new game since it'll be easier to patch that way.

At the moment, this game is completely SFW, but it will eventually contain erotic art and themes. Also, one of the planned possible relationships is M/M - as is implied in one of the screenshots - and I will add the LGBT tag to the game once that is included.

All Character Art, Character Design, Backgrounds, and Dialog was created by the creator of the game.

Credits for UI Design, Cursor Design, Character 3D Model Resources, etc will be added as the game state progresses and will be finalized before the game is sold.

Characters and Backgrounds were made in Daz Studio 3D.

Current Storyline Status:

Kamea + Talis: Day 1: 50% Complete

Liani + Rissa: Day 1: 75% Complete

Erith + Kol: Day 1: 25% Complete

Secret Character 1: ???

Secret Character 2: ???

This is an alpha version and does not represent the final quality of the game.
